name: @holoscript/wasm
description: HoloScript parser compiled to WebAssembly for high-performance browser execution

scripts.build: echo 'WASM build requires wasm-pack (Rust toolchain) - skipping if not available' && wasm-pack build --target web --out-dir pkg || echo 'wasm-pack not installed, skipping WASM build'
scripts.test: cargo test || echo 'cargo not installed, skipping WASM tests'

author: HoloScript Team
